Author: Koenari
Name: Himbeertoni Raid Tool
Description: A collection of useful tools for RaidGroups, including loot management
Changelog:
New Feature: You can now track multiple characters per player
Lootmaster: Reworked group view to improve user experience this includes:
    One click reordering of players
    Create new player from target
    Quickly add existing players or characters from the database
Ui: New windows for editing players and characters
Bugfix: corrected behaviour when deleting main job
